contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=August 2012}} {{Infobox person | name = Jaclyn Linetsky | image = Jaclyn_Linetsky.jpg | imagesize = 250px | caption = | birth_name = Jaclyn Michelle Linetsky | birth_date = {{Birth date|1986|1|8|mf=y}} | birth_place = [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]] | death_date = {{Death date and age|2003|9|8|1986|1|8|mf=y}} | death_place = [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]] | years_active = 1994-2003 | website = | notable role = '''Megan O'Connor''' in ''[[15/Love]] }} '''Jaclyn Michelle Linetsky''' (January 8, 1986<ref name = "Births and Deaths"/> – September 8, 2003) was a Canadian [[actress]]. ==Personal Life== Jaclyn Michelle Linetsky was born at the [[Jewish General Hospital]] to Larry Linetsky, son of Eunice and Ell Linetsky, and Terry Weiner, daughter of Jeanne and David Weiner. She also had 2 siblings, Kelly and Derek.<ref name = "Births and Deaths">[http://news.google.com/newspapers?id=G4Y0AAAAIBAJ&sjid=5KUFAAAAIBAJ&pg=1185,3959694&dq=jaclyn+linetsky&hl=en Births and Deaths]. [[The Montreal Gazette]]. January 18, 1986. Accessed from May 7, 2013.</ref> Linetsky was raised in the suburb of [[Hampstead, Quebec|Hampstead]] in [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]]. She graduated from [[St. George's High School, Montreal]] in 2003 and spoke at the graduation ceremony. ==Career== Linetsky dubbed the English voice for [[Caillou (character)|Caillou]] in the preschool [[Caillou|animated series of the same name]] between 2000 and 2002. She also provided the voices for Bitzi in the 2002 animated series ''[[Daft Planet]]'', Lori Mackney in ''[[What's With Andy?]]'' (2003â€“2004), and Meg in ''[[Mega Babies]]''. Her other roles in voice acting included ''Kit and Kaboodle'', ''[[Sagwa, the Chinese Siamese Cat]]'', ''[[The Kids from Room 402]]'', ''[[Wunschpunsch]]'', ''[[The Country Mouse and the City Mouse Adventures]]'', ''Pet Pals'', ''[[Tommy and Oscar]]'', ''[[Simon in the Land of Chalk Drawings]]'', ''[[Jim Button]]'' and popular videogames ''Alex Builds His Farm'' and ''[[Evolution Worlds]]''. That year, Linetsky was cast in the tennis-circuit themed dramatic series ''[[15/Love]]'' on [[YTV (TV channel)|YTV]]. Her character, Megan O'Conner, was mutually falling in love with co-star [http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=7873521 Vadim Schneider's] character, Sebastien Dube. ==Death== On September 8, 2003, Linetsky and Schneider were driving to the filming of an episode of ''15/Love'' when the minivan lost control and collided with oncoming traffic. Both actors were killed in the accident. Their deaths were put into the storyline with Megan and Sebastien being killed in a plane crash while on their way home from a tennis tournament in Episode 12. ==References== {{reflist}} * {{cite news|title=Jaclyn Linetsky: Montreal teen was the voice of Caillou|work=[[The Globe and Mail]]|date=September 16, 2003|author=Allison Lawlor|page=R7}} ==External links== *{{IMDb name|1109926}} *{{Findagrave|7867826}} * http://www.jaclynlinetsky.com The official website in memory of Jaclyn Linetsky {{Authority control|VIAF=16950048}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Linetsky, Jaclyn | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = January 8, 1986 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]] | DATE OF DEATH = September 8, 2007 | PLACE OF DEATH = [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Linetsky, Jaclyn}} [[Category:1986 births]] [[Category:2007 deaths]] [[Category:Accidental deaths in Quebec]] [[Category:Anglophone Quebec people]] [[Category:Canadian child actresses]] [[Category:Jewish Canadian actresses]] [[Category:Canadian voice actresses]] [[Category:Actresses from Montreal]] [[Category:Road accident deaths in Canada]] [[Category:People from Hampstead, Quebec]]
